DocAttribute.Name: SurfaceReinforcement1
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reinforcement at the face of the member which is located at the side of the positive local z direction of the surface member. Specified as area per length, e.g. square metre per metre (hence length measure, e.g. metre). The reinforcement area may be specified for two or three directions of reinforcement bars.

DocAttribute.Name: SurfaceReinforcement2
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reinforcement at the face of the member which is located at the side of the negative local z direction of the surface member. Specified as area per length, e.g. square metre per metre (hence length measure, e.g. metre). The reinforcement area may be specified for two or three directions of reinforcement bars.

DocAttribute.Name: ShearReinforcement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Shear reinforcement. Specified as area per area, e.g. square metre per square metre (hence ratio measure, i.e. unitless).

DocWhereRule.Name: SurfaceAndOrShearAreaSpecified
DocWhereRule.Documentation: At least one of the reinforcement area attributes shall be specified.

DocWhereRule.Name: NonnegativeArea1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Surface reinforcement area must not be less than 0.

DocWhereRule.Name: NonnegativeArea2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Surface reinforcement area must not be less than 0.

DocWhereRule.Name: NonnegativeArea3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Shear reinforcement area must not be less than 0.
